body.text:
Dear Ramesh and Komal,

I apologize for the oversight in sending this request after HPCI. We are now proceeding with the Matangi approval process for Sorbitans, and regional representatives will be in touch to request necessary documents. India is our primary region since Matangi's production plant location and serves as our hub for accelerating approvals, your prompt attention to this matter is crucial. Could you please check and revert as soon as possible, providing quotes in Indian Rupees (INR)?
